plot: Girl meets boy - or has she? For her, the image taps into her dreams. For him, it's an equally enchanting but otherworldly experience. Then reality intervenes. For both - or is it the four of them?
title: The Man on Her Mind
plot_es: Girl meets boy - or has she? For her, the image taps into her dreams. For him, it's an equally enchanting but otherworldly experience. Then reality intervenes. For both - or is it the four of them?
plot_en: Girl meets boy - or has she? For her, the image taps into her dreams. For him, it's an equally enchanting but otherworldly experience. Then reality intervenes. For both - or is it the four of them?

produce.name: Man On Her Mind Films, The
